response.en: When you resort to something outside,
response.zh: 当你求助于外界的东西时，

response.en: you are fishing on the tree.
response.ar: أنت تصطاد السمك من على الشجرة.

response.en: superficial stuff and ignore the essence.
response.zh: 只顾表面的东西忽略了本质。
用中文的表达方式就是

response.en: trying to catch fish on a tree.
